segments.text: I'm observing the children and their cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy has positioned the stool quite strategically, even if it's unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate to catch the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager, raised hand shows real teamwork and anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a certain cleverness in their clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little bit happy for their mischievous spirit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their goal, completely in their own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard anything, or sensed their presence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risk of the stool tipping is quite high, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so confident in their secret plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment of trying to get away with something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the whole thing goes sideways.
segments.speaker: PAR
